description: Defines a Flutter widget called OceanButton, which is a customizable button with options for loading state, icon, secondary styling, and label.

classes.name: OceanButton
classes.description: A customizable Flutter button widget with primary and secondary styles, optional icon, loading indicator, and label.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, displaying a loading indicator or a row with optional icon and label, styled as either an ElevatedButton or OutlinedButton based on the 'secondary' flag.
